title: Is It Possible to Play Every Latest and Greatest Game? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.21.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about an astounding 93 games that Take Two is working on and answer the question: "Is it possible to play everything?" 
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:04:50 - Housekeeping
WE’RE STREAMING CORE TODAY AT 1:30pm pacific, AND THEN RIGHT AFTER, ANDY AND BLESS ARE STREAMING AMAZON’S NEW GAME CRUCIBLE. That’s all happening on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames. REMEMBER: We’re doing a Core Game Jam - kindafunny.com/gamejam - $100 gets donated to Extra Life for every game submitted. To enter, publish a new game on the Core platform in one of four categories: party game, (kinda) funniest game, retro game, and pop-culture inspired game. There’s $5k in prizes, head to kindafunny.com/gamejam
10-year anniversary of ModNation Racers
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black JackAl Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:07:15 - Take-Two plans to release 93 games in the next 5 years - Rebekah Valentine @ GIBiz
00:18:20 - Are we approaching a time when keeping up with the latest and greatest games from the major publishers will be impossible? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:36:45 - Valorant has release date and progress is getting wiped
00:39:15 - Could we see the return of that Scott Pilgrim game? - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:41:48 - Id Software is removing anti-cheat from Doom Eternal on PC - Julia Lee @ Polygon
00:44:30 - Out today
00:54:10 -  Reader mail   -
00:56:50 - What if EA's unannounced sports game is a new Fight Night game? - SubZero23
01:05:20 - Squad Up: anakinjmt(Online) - https://store.collarandelbowbrand.com/collections/mens/products/beast
01:08:02 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
